Our materials
我们的食材

进口橄榄油是我们队食材要求精益求精的又一绝佳体现。高成本的进口实仓让风靡欧洲的高品质轻体食体验在中国得以实现。

Produced from Andalusia's Golden Coast,a hundred percent natural fruit juice with fragrance and non greasy,mixed with fresh lemon juice,creating a fresh and creamy taste.

某某食材

进口橄榄油是我们队食材要求精益求精的又一绝佳体现。高成本的进口实仓让风靡欧洲的高品质轻体食体验在中国得以实现。

Produced from Andalusia's Golden Coast,a hundred percent natural fruit juice with fragrance and non greasy,mixed with fresh lemon juice,creating a fresh and creamy taste.
